title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, embed, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode) packaged as a lightweight Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama exposing chat, generate, embed, pull, delete and listing APIs with POJO models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull models in idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive REPL for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for offline AI pair-programming.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for running Ollama server + CUDA or CPU inference in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and GPU node selectors.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + llama-index to chat over private PDFs entirely offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models from Slack channels with rate-limiting and ACLs.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript wrappers for all Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, push models from Python 3.8+.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag-streamlit
summary: Turn-key Streamlit app for chatting with local PDFs using Ollama embeddings and Llama 2/3 models.
